00031 /* Creation flags. */

00033 #define H_FIFO   XNSYNCH_FIFO   /* Pend by FIFO order. */
00034 #define H_DMA    0x100          /* Use memory suitable for DMA. */
00035 #define H_SHARED 0x200          /* Use mappable shared memory. */
